introduction.part1: Evolution Hub offers an innovative collection of AI-powered tools specifically designed for developers and creatives. With our AI-powered tools, you can optimize your workflow, automate repetitive tasks, and increase your productivity. Whether you want to generate code, create content, or analyze complex data, our platform supports you at every step.
introduction.part2: The intelligent combination of artificial intelligence and user-friendly design enables you to unleash your creativity and bring projects to life faster. Discover our powerful features and learn how you can shape the future of software development and content creation with Evolution Hub.
introduction.part3_de: Unsere fortschrittlichen Algorithmen und benutzerfreundlichen Interfaces arbeiten nahtlos zusammen, um Ihnen die bestm√∂gliche Entwicklererfahrung zu bieten. Von der ersten Idee bis zur finalen Umsetzung ‚Äì Evolution Hub begleitet Sie durch jeden Schritt Ihres kreativen Prozesses.
introduction.part4_de: Nutzen Sie die Kraft der k√ºnstlichen Intelligenz, um komplexe Aufgaben zu vereinfachen, innovative Solutions zu entwickeln und Ihre Projekte auf das n√§chste Level zu heben. Mit Evolution Hub gestalten Sie die Zukunft der digitalen Entwicklung.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: Can I change my plan later?
faq.answer1: Yes, you can switch between plans at any time. The change will take effect at the start of your next billing cycle.
faq.question2: Is there a minimum contract period?
faq.answer2: No, all plans can be canceled monthly. There is no contractual commitment.
faq.question3: Can I test the Enterprise version?
faq.answer3: Yes, contact us for a personalized demo and trial of the Enterprise features.

items.question: Was ist EvolutionHub?
items.answer: EvolutionHub ist eine Plattform f√ºr moderne Webentwicklung mit Fokus auf Performance, Benutzerfreundlichkeit und moderne Technologien.

items.question: Welche Technologien werden verwendet?
items.answer: Wir verwenden Astro f√ºr das Frontend, TypeScript f√ºr typsichere Entwicklung, und Tailwind CSS f√ºr das Styling. Unser Backend basiert auf modernen JavaScript/TypeScript-Technologien.

items.question: Ist ein Konto erforderlich?
items.answer: F√ºr die meisten Funktionen ben√∂tigen Sie ein Konto. Einige Bereiche wie die Dokumentation und Blogbeitr√§ge sind auch ohne Konto einsehbar.

items.question: Wie wird der Datenschutz gew√§hrleistet?
items.answer: Wir legen gro√üen Wert auf Datenschutz und Sicherheit. Alle Daten werden verschl√ºsselt √ºbertragen und gem√§√ü der DSGVO verarbeitet.

items.question: Wann ist der Support erreichbar?
items.answer: Unser Support-Team ist von Montag bis Freitag, 9 bis 18 Uhr, f√ºr Sie erreichbar.

items.question: Ist EvolutionHub auch mobil nutzbar?
items.answer: Ja, unsere Plattform ist f√ºr mobile Ger√§te optimiert und kann auf Smartphones und Tablets genutzt werden.

items.question: Ist die Plattform barrierefrei?
items.answer: Wir arbeiten kontinuierlich daran, die Barrierefreiheit unserer Plattform zu verbessern, um sie f√ºr alle Nutzer zug√§nglich zu machen.

items.question: Wie erstelle ich ein Konto?
items.answer: Klicken Sie auf "Registrieren" in der oberen Navigation und folgen Sie den Anweisungen. Sie ben√∂tigen eine g√ºltige E-Mail-Adresse.

items.question: Wie kann ich mein Passwort zur√ºcksetzen?
items.answer: Auf der Anmeldeseite finden Sie einen Link "Passwort vergessen". Geben Sie Ihre E-Mail-Adresse ein und folgen Sie den Anweisungen in der erhaltenen E-Mail.

items.question: Wie k√ºndige ich mein Abonnement?
items.answer: Gehen Sie zu Ihren Kontoeinstellungen und w√§hlen Sie "Abonnement verwalten". Dort k√∂nnen Sie Ihr Abonnement k√ºndigen.

items.question: Welche Abonnement-Pl√§ne gibt es?
items.answer: Wir bieten verschiedene Pl√§ne an, die auf unterschiedliche Bed√ºrfnisse zugeschnitten sind. Details finden Sie auf unserer Pricing-Seite.

items.question: Welche Zahlungsmethoden werden akzeptiert?
items.answer: Wir akzeptieren Kreditkarten, PayPal und SEPA-Lastschriftverfahren.

items.question: Wie kann ich mein Konto wiederherstellen, wenn ich den Zugang verliere?
items.answer: Nutzen Sie die Passwort-zur√ºcksetzen-Funktion oder kontaktieren Sie unseren Support f√ºr weitere Hilfe.

items.question: Wie verwalte ich meine Benachrichtigungseinstellungen?
items.answer: In Ihren Kontoeinstellungen k√∂nnen Sie festlegen, welche Benachrichtigungen Sie erhalten m√∂chten.

items.question: Welche Browser werden unterst√ºtzt?
items.answer: Wir unterst√ºtzen die aktuellen Versionen von Chrome, Firefox, Safari, und Edge. √Ñltere Browser werden m√∂glicherweise nicht vollst√§ndig unterst√ºtzt.

items.question: Wie kann ich die API nutzen?
items.answer: Unsere API-Dokumentation finden Sie unter /api-docs. Sie ben√∂tigen einen API-Schl√ºssel, den Sie in Ihren Kontoeinstellungen generieren k√∂nnen.

items.question: Wie melde ich einen Fehler?
items.answer: Bitte nutzen Sie unser Fehlerformular unter /kontakt oder erstellen Sie ein Issue in unserem GitHub-Repository.

items.question: Gibt es Nutzungslimits f√ºr die API?
items.answer: Ja, unsere API hat Nutzungslimits, um eine faire Verteilung der Ressourcen sicherzustellen. Details finden Sie in der API-Dokumentation.

items.question: Kann ich EvolutionHub mit Drittanbieter-Tools integrieren?
items.answer: Ja, wir bieten Integrationen und Webhooks f√ºr verschiedene Drittanbieter-Services an.

items.question: Welche Systemanforderungen gibt es?
items.answer: F√ºr die Nutzung empfehlen wir aktuelle Browser und eine stabile Internetverbindung.

items.question: Gibt es Backup- und Wiederherstellungsoptionen?
items.answer: Ja, Ihre Daten werden regelm√§√üig gesichert und k√∂nnen bei Bedarf wiederhergestellt werden.

1.title: Scope
1.content: These Terms govern the use of Evolution Hub‚Äôs services and apply to all contracts concluded with Evolution Hub GmbH.

2.title: Conclusion of Contract
2.content: A contract is formed when you complete registration or otherwise accept these Terms, for example by using the service after being informed about these Terms.

3.title: Services
3.content: We provide a cloud-based platform and related features. The scope of services is determined by the plan selected and the documentation valid at the time of conclusion.

4.title: Accounts and Security
4.content: You are responsible for the confidentiality of your login credentials and for all activities under your account. You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use.

5.title: Prices and Payment
5.content: Fees, billing cycles, and payment methods are specified on the pricing page. All prices are in EUR unless stated otherwise. Statutory taxes may apply.

6.title: Term and Termination
6.content: Contracts are concluded for an indefinite period and may be canceled at the end of the current billing period. We may terminate for cause, including material breaches.

7.title: Acceptable Use
7.content: You may not misuse the service, interfere with its operation, or violate applicable law. Automated scraping, reverse engineering, or security testing without consent is prohibited.

8.title: Warranty and Liability
8.content: The service is provided as-is within the scope of the selected plan. Our liability is limited to intent and gross negligence, except where mandatory law provides otherwise.

9.title: Intellectual Property
9.content: All intellectual property rights in the service remain with Evolution Hub or its licensors. You receive a non-exclusive, non-transferable right to use the service during the term.

10.title: Data Protection
10.content: We process personal data in accordance with our Privacy Policy. For details on processing purposes and legal bases, see pages.datenschutz.

11.title: Governing Law and Venue
11.content: These Terms are governed by German law, excluding its conflict-of-law rules. The courts of Berlin shall have jurisdiction to the extent permitted by law.

11_participation.title: Participation in Dispute Resolution
11_participation.content: We are neither willing nor obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

12.title: Changes to These Terms
12.content: We may adjust these Terms to reflect changes in law or our services. Material changes will be communicated in advance. Continued use signifies acceptance.

dispute_resolution.headline: Dispute Resolution

dispute_resolution.participation_statement: We are neither willing nor obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

content_liability.headline: Liability for Content
content_liability.paragraph1: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages according to Section 7(1) of the German Telemedia Act (TMG). However, pursuant to ¬ß¬ß 8 to 10 TMG, we as a service provider are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
content_liability.paragraph2: Obligations to remove or block the use of information according to general laws remain unaffected. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the point in time at which a concrete infringement of rights becomes known. In the event of corresponding infringements becoming known, we will remove this content immediately.

link_liability.headline: Liability for Links
link_liability.paragraph1: Our offer includes links to external websites of third parties, the content of which we have no influence over. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for this external content. The respective provider or operator of the sites is always responsible for the content of the linked pages. The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not apparent at the time of linking.
link_liability.paragraph2: However, continuous monitoring of the content of linked pages is not feasible without concrete evidence of an infringement. In the event of infringements becoming known, we will remove such links immediately.

copyright.headline: Copyright
copyright.paragraph1: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. The reproduction, processing, dissemination, and any type of use outside the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this page are only permitted for private, non-commercial use.
copyright.paragraph2: To the extent that the content on this page was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are respected. In particular, third-party content is identified as such. If you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, we ask for a corresponding notification. In the event of infringements becoming known, we will remove such content immediately.

image_credits.headline: Image Credits
image_credits.description: The images and graphics used on this website are subject to the copyright of Evolution Hub GmbH or are royalty-free stock photos from third-party providers.

1.title: 1. Responsible Party
1.description: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other national data protection laws of the member states, as well as other data protection provisions, the responsible party is:

2.title: 2. Basics of Data Processing
2.description: We generally process our users' personal data only to the extent necessary to provide a functional website and our content and services. The processing of our users' personal data regularly occurs only after user consent. An exception applies in cases where obtaining prior consent is not possible for factual reasons and the processing of data is permitted by statutory provisions.

3.title: 3. Provision of the Website and Creation of Log Files
3.subtitle: Description and scope of data processing
3.paragraph1: Every time our website is accessed, our system automatically collects data and information from the computer system of the accessing computer.

4.title: 4. Cookies
4.description: Our website uses cookies. Cookies are text files that are stored in the internet browser or by the internet browser on the user's computer system. When a user accesses a website, a cookie may be stored on the user's operating system. This cookie contains a characteristic string that allows unique identification of the browser upon repeated access to the website.

5.title: 5. Contact Form and Email Contact
5.paragraph1: Our website provides a contact form that can be used for electronic contact. If a user takes advantage of this option, the data entered into the input mask will be transmitted and stored by us.
5.paragraph2: Alternatively, contact can be made via the provided e-mail address. In this case, the personal data of the user transmitted with the e-mail will be stored.

list_items.0: pursuant to Art. 15 GDPR to request information about your personal data processed by us
list_items.1: pursuant to Art. 16 GDPR to immediately request the rectification of inaccurate or completion of your personal data stored by us
list_items.2: pursuant to Art. 17 GDPR to request the erasure of your personal data stored by us
list_items.3: pursuant to Art. 18 GDPR to request the restriction of the processing of your personal data
list_items.4: pursuant to Art. 20 GDPR to receive your personal data that you have provided to us in a structured, common, and machine-readable format
list_items.5: pursuant to Art. 7 para. 3 GDPR to withdraw your consent at any time
list_items.6: pursuant to Art. 77 GDPR to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority

7.title: 7. Right to Object
7.description: You have the right to object, on grounds relating to your particular situation, at any time to the processing of personal data concerning you which is based on Art. 6 para. 1 lit. e or f GDPR.

8.title: 8. Data Security
8.description: Within the website visit, we use the widespread SSL (Secure Socket Layer) procedure in conjunction with the highest level of encryption supported by your browser. This is typically 256-bit encryption. If your browser does not support 256-bit encryption, we will use 128-bit v3 technology instead.

9.title: 9. Timeliness and Changes to This Privacy Policy
9.description: This Privacy Policy is currently valid and dated July 2025. Due to the further development of our website and offerings or due to changed legal or regulatory requirements, it may become necessary to amend this Privacy Policy.
